Title: LinkedIn WinRT
Description: This library provides basic functionality for using the LinkedIn API in a Windows 8 Store App.
HomeWiki:
LinkedIn WinRT
This library provides basic functionality for using the LinkedIn API in a Windows 8 Store App.


Features
  • Login with WebAuthenticationBroker
  • Get user info(id, name, email, profile picture, full profile, etc.)
  • Get the connections of the authenticated user

Download LinkedInWinRT from CodePlex or install using NuGet
TagList: winrt linkedin,windows 8 linkedin,linkedin c#,winrt linkedin api,linkedin oauth,
